abstract.para: This dataset contains the supplementary materials (PDFs, R scripts, simulated data, Bayesian outputs, and diagnostic plots) supporting the findings of the associated manuscript. Author details have been removed for peer review.

otherEntity.entityDescription: Description of the methodology used to estimate average carcass persistence probability for the studied vertebrate groups. It details the data adaptation from Santos et al. (2011) and the area-under-the-curve calculation method.
R script to simulate and analyse road survey census data for vertebrate groups affected by carcass location and persistence bias.
R script to simulate and analyse road survey census data for vertebrate groups not affected by carcass location bias.
R script to simulate and analyse road survey census data for vertebrate groups only affected by carcass persistence bias (mammals g5).
Seasonal trends .csv for each vertebrate group.
R script to simulate and analyse road survey census data for amphibians and reptiles g1 groups only accounting for peak abundance months.
Workflow describing the simulation scenarios and prior specifications (accurate, inaccurate, uninformative) used to assess prior sensitivity analyses.
R script to simulate and analyse road survey census data for the prior sensitivity analysis for vertebrate groups affected by carcass location and persistence bias.
R script to simulate and analyse road survey census data for the prior sensitivity analysis for vertebrate groups only affected by carcass persistence bias.
R script to simulate and analyse road survey census data for the Prior Sensitivity Analysis for vertebrate groups only affected by carcass location bias (Mammals G5).
R script to calculate Relative Root Mean Squared Error (RRMSE) values for total number of roadkills estimation (N_t).
R script to calculate Relative Root Mean Squared Error (RRMSE) values for carcass location, persistence and observation probability.
Map of the study area and detailed characteristics (coordinates, habitat, speed limit, traffic volume) of the nine road transects monitored during the case study.

Figure displaying the Relative Root Mean Squared Error (RRMSE) of the estimated total number of roadkills (Nt,D) for each vertebrate group. It evaluates model accuracy across different simulation scenarios of variable data, prior standard errors, and sampling effort (10 vs 100 transects).

Plots illustrating the overlap between the averaged simulated values of total roadkills per transect and the 95% credible intervals of the Bayesian posterior estimates, across all vertebrate groups and simulation scenarios of variable data.
Plots illustrating the overlap between simulated and recovered/estimated probabilities for carcass location (pL), persistence (pP), and observation (pOm).

Plots results of the prior sensitivity analyses, displaying the posterior estimation overlap for total roadkills (Nt,D) and bias probabilities (pL, pP, pOm) across all vertebrate groups and prior scenarios.
Case study dataset and code for analysing the differences between roadkills observed per survey method.
Processed sample of simulated data and the results from simulation scenarios of variable data analysis.
Files containing the simulated values of total roadkills (Nitd) and the results of the Bayesian analysis for the simulation scenarios of variable data, prior sensitivity analyses, and the case study.
Convergence diagnostics (ESS values and traceplots) for the Bayesian MCMC chains across the simulation scenarios of variable data, prior sensitivity analyses, and the case study.

eml:eml.title: Supplementary Material for: A method to estimate actual infrastructure-induced mortality by integrating sampling biases
